robot_txt.title: Robot txt
robot_txt.description: The robots.txt file is a text file at the root of a website that guides crawlers on what parts of the site they can and cannot crawl, helping to manage indexing and protect private areas.

static_site_map_item.title: Static Pages Sitemap
static_site_map_item.description: A static pages sitemap is an XML file that lists all the URLs on a website that do not change frequently, helping search engines crawl and index these pages more efficiently.

sitemap.title: Analytics & Monitoring
sitemap.description: Analytics and monitoring involve collecting, evaluating, and tracking data to optimize performance, detect anomalies, and make informed decisions. This includes using tools and techniques to examine trends, measure key metrics, and ensure compliance with strategic goals.
